TEXT.English: Make Ayutthaya the most populous city in the world in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1700年时使Ayutthaya成为世界上人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Allow no foreign powers in Southern Asia in 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1900年时确保南亚没有非南亚文明的殖民地
在公元1000年之前拥有5座城市

TEXT.English: Settle 5 great prophets in Lhasa by 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1700年之前使5位大预言家入驻Lhasa

TEXT.English: Have four non-obsolete wonders in your capital in 1550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: Have four non-obsolete wonders in your capital in 1550 AD

TEXT.English: Control the Eastern Mediterranean, the Black Sea, Cairo, Mecca, Baghdad and Vienna by 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: Control the Eastern Mediterranean, the Black Sea, Cairo, Mecca, Baghdad and Vienna by 1700 AD

TEXT.English: Have more culture than all European civilizations combined in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: Have more culture than all European civilizations combined in 1800 AD

TEXT.English: Control the core of another European civilization in 1050 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1050年时控制其他文明的核心区域

TEXT.English: Found a city in America by 1100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1100年之前于美洲建立一座城市

TEXT.English: Acquire 3000 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前通过劫掠区域设施、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得3000金币

TEXT.English: Acquire 4500 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前通过劫掠、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得4500金币

TEXT.English: Acquire 9000 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1500年之前通过劫掠、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得9000金币

TEXT.English: Chosen People: Have a total of 15 Great Prophets, Scientists and Statesmen in your cities
TEXT.Chinese: Chosen People: Have a total of 15 Great Prophets, Scientists and Statesmen in your cities

TEXT.English: Promised Land: Have legendary culture in the Jewish holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Promised Land: Have legendary culture in the Jewish holy city

TEXT.English: Diaspora: Have friendly relations with six civilizations with a Jewish minority
TEXT.Chinese: Diaspora: Have friendly relations with six civilizations with a Jewish minority

TEXT.English: Sila: Be at peace for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Sila: Be at peace for 100 turns

TEXT.English: Sila: Be at peace for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Sila: Be at peace for 150 turns

TEXT.English: Sila: Be at peace for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Sila: Be at peace for 300 turns

TEXT.English: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 100 turns

TEXT.English: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 150 turns

TEXT.English: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 300 turns

TEXT.English: Middle Way: Have cautious or better relations with all civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Middle Way: Have cautious or better relations with all civilizations

TEXT.English: Holy See: Be Pope for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Holy See: Be Pope for 100 turns

TEXT.English: Holy See: Be Pope for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Holy See: Be Pope for 150 turns

TEXT.English: Holy See: Be Pope for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Holy See: Be Pope for 300 turns

TEXT.English: Holy Land: Control the Catholic shrine and make sure that at least 12 great prophets are settled in Catholic civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Holy Land: Control the Catholic shrine and make sure that at least 12 great prophets are settled in Catholic civilizations

TEXT.English: Holy Mission: Make sure at least 50% of the world is controlled by Catholic civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Holy Mission: Make sure at least 50% of the world is controlled by Catholic civilizations

TEXT.English: Harmony: Have friendly relations with five civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Harmony: Have friendly relations with five civilizations

TEXT.English: Ritual: Have five wonders in the Confucian holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Ritual: Have five wonders in the Confucian holy city

TEXT.English: Loyalty: Control an army of 200 non-obsolete melee or gunpowder units
TEXT.Chinese: Loyalty: Control an army of 200 non-obsolete melee or gunpowder units

TEXT.English: Varna: Settle five different great people in the Hindu holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Varna: Settle five different great people in the Hindu holy city

TEXT.English: Artha: Experience 24 turns of golden age
TEXT.Chinese: Artha: Experience 24 turns of golden age

TEXT.English: Artha: Experience 36 turns of golden age
TEXT.Chinese: Artha: Experience 36 turns of golden age

TEXT.English: Artha: Experience 72 turns of golden age
TEXT.Chinese: Artha: Experience 72 turns of golden age

TEXT.English: Kama: Make sure the five largest cities in the world are Hindu
TEXT.Chinese: Kama: Make sure the five largest cities in the world are Hindu

TEXT.English: Hajj: Settle seven great people in the Muslim holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Hajj: Settle seven great people in the Muslim holy city

TEXT.English: Iconography: Make sure the five most cultured cities in the world are Orthodox
TEXT.Chinese: Iconography: Make sure the five most cultured cities in the world are Orthodox

TEXT.English: Communion: Make sure there are no Catholic civilizations in the world
TEXT.Chinese: Communion: Make sure there are no Catholic civilizations in the world

TEXT.English: Make sure there are 15 pagan temples in the world
TEXT.Chinese: Make sure there are 15 pagan temples in the world

TEXT.English: Have more wonders in your capital than any other city in the world
TEXT.Chinese: Have more wonders in your capital than any other city in the world

TEXT.English: Have five units of level five
TEXT.Chinese: Have five units of level five

TEXT.English: Acquire four pearl resources and control 50 ocean tiles
TEXT.Chinese: Acquire four pearl resources and control 50 ocean tiles

TEXT.English: Make your capital the city with the highest trade income in the world
TEXT.Chinese: Make your capital the city with the highest trade income in the world

TEXT.English: Control 20 unimproved forest or marsh tiles
TEXT.Chinese: Control 20 unimproved forest or marsh tiles

TEXT.English: Have more gold in your treasury than the rest of the world combined
TEXT.Chinese: Have more gold in your treasury than the rest of the world combined

TEXT.English: Control ten wonders that require no state religion
TEXT.Chinese: Control ten wonders that require no state religion

TEXT.English: Be first to create three different types of great person
TEXT.Chinese: Be first to create three different types of great person

TEXT.English: Settle three great spies in your capital
TEXT.Chinese: Settle three great spies in your capital

TEXT.English: Have 100 turns of cities celebrating "We Love the King" day
TEXT.Chinese: Have 100 turns of cities celebrating "We Love the King" day

TEXT.English: Acquire eight ivory resources and six gem resources
TEXT.Chinese: Acquire eight ivory resources and six gem resources

TEXT.English: Don't allow more than half of your cities to have a religion
TEXT.Chinese: Don't allow more than half of your cities to have a religion

TEXT.English: Enlightenment: Be first to discover Civil Liberties, Social Contract and Economics
TEXT.Chinese: Enlightenment: Be first to discover Civil Liberties, Social Contract and Economics

TEXT.English: Work Ethic: Make sure five great merchants and five great engineers are settled in Protestant civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Work Ethic: Make sure five great merchants and five great engineers are settled in Protestant civilizations

TEXT.English: Religious Freedom: Make sure at least half of all civilizations are Protestant or secular
TEXT.Chinese: Religious Freedom: Make sure at least half of all civilizations are Protestant or secular

TEXT.English: Tolerance: Control the Cathedrals of all religions
TEXT.Chinese: Tolerance: Control the Cathedrals of all religions

TEXT.English: Humanism: Make sure there are 25 Universities, 10 Great Scientists and 10 Great Statesmen in secular civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: Humanism: Make sure there are 25 Universities, 10 Great Scientists and 10 Great Statesmen in secular civilizations

TEXT.English: Modernity: Make sure that the five most advanced independent civilizations are secular
TEXT.Chinese: Modernity: Make sure that the five most advanced independent civilizations are secular

TEXT.English: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 100 turns

TEXT.English: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 150 turns

TEXT.English: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 300 turns

TEXT.English: Moderation: Control the Confucian and Taoist shrines and combine their income to 40 gold
TEXT.Chinese: Moderation: Control the Confucian and Taoist shrines and combine their income to 40 gold

TEXT.English: Humility: Have legendary culture in the Taoist holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Humility: Have legendary culture in the Taoist holy city

TEXT.English: Shahnameh: Have legendary culture in the Zoroastrian holy city
TEXT.Chinese: Shahnameh: Have legendary culture in the Zoroastrian holy city

TEXT.English: Road along the Andean Coast in your territory
Check the Victory Conditions (F8) for details
TEXT.Chinese: 查看胜利条件界面(F8)了解详情

TEXT.English: Number of melee and gunpowder units: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: Number of melee and gunpowder units: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Controlled unimproved Forest and Marsh tiles: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: Controlled unimproved Forest and Marsh tiles: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: South America, Central America and the Caribbean: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 南美洲、中美洲以及加勒比地区： %d1 / %d2
控制一个欧洲文明的核心区域

TEXT.English: Colonies in Brazil, Africa and Asia: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 巴西、非洲和亚洲的殖民地: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: First to enter the Industrial Era
First to enter the Modern Era
You have failed goal %d1 of your historical victory!
Great prophets, scientists and engineers in %s1_city: %d2 / %d3
TEXT.Chinese: 入驻%s1_city的预言家、科学家和工程师 %d2 / %d3

TEXT.English: Turns with highest life expectancy rating: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: Turns with highest life expectancy rating: %d1 / %d2
每座城市商业产值最高: %s1
人均商业值最高的城市：%s1
世界上人口最多的文明：

TEXT.English: City with the highest trade income: %s1_city
TEXT.Chinese: City with the highest trade income: %s1_city

TEXT.English: We have accomplished 2 Historical Goals out of 3. A Triumphal Arch has been built in our capital
TEXT.Chinese: 我们完成了3个历史目标中的2个。一座凯旋门已在我们首都建成。

TEXT.English: Great Prophets, Scientists and Statesmen in Jewish cities: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: Great Prophets, Scientists and Statesmen in Jewish cities: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Civilization with the largest Catholic population:
TEXT.Chinese: 全世界天主教人口最多的文明：

TEXT.English: Total of frigates and ships of the line: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 三桅战舰和主力战舰数： %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: No European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa in 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年在东非近赤道地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: No European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa in 1910 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1910年在东非近赤道地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: Currently no European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa
TEXT.Chinese: 确保东非及其近赤道地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: No European colonies in Central America, Southern USA and the Caribbean
TEXT.Chinese: 中美洲、美国南部和加勒比地区没有欧洲人的殖民地

TEXT.English: No European colonies in North and Central America and the Caribbean
TEXT.Chinese: 北美洲、中美洲和加勒比地区没有欧洲人的殖民地
欧洲不存在信仰新教的国家

TEXT.English: No European colonies in South America (except Brazil)
TEXT.Chinese: 南美洲（巴西除外）没有欧洲人的定居点

TEXT.English: No foreign colonies in South Asia
TEXT.Chinese: 南亚没有外国的殖民地

TEXT.English: Never more than half of all cities with a religion
TEXT.Chinese: Never more than half of all cities with a religion

TEXT.English: Great prophets settled in the Sankore city: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 在桑科雷大学内入驻的大预言家: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.Chinese: First to discover technologies in the %s1 era: %d2 / %d3

TEXT.English: Railroad from Moscow to a Siberian port
TEXT.Chinese: 西伯利亚大铁路（莫斯科至――西伯利亚港口）

TEXT.Chinese: Turns of "We Love the King" days: %d1 / %d2
